name: scryb-v
description: Vicaran - AI-powered investigation platform for journalists

scripts.install: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd apps/vicaran-agent && command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo 'uv is not installed. Installing uv...'; curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh; . "$HOME/.cargo/env"; } && uv sync --all-extras
scripts.dev:backend: cd apps/vicaran-agent && npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- uv run python app.py
scripts.dev:api: cd apps/vicaran-agent && npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- uv run python scripts/run_adk_api.py
scripts.adk:web: cd apps/vicaran-agent && npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- uv run python -m google.adk.cli web .
scripts.adk:api: cd apps/vicaran-agent && npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- uv run python scripts/run_adk_api.py
scripts.lint:backend: cd apps/vicaran-agent && uv run ruff check
scripts.deploy:adk: cd apps/vicaran-agent && uv export --no-hashes --no-header --no-dev --no-emit-project --no-annotate > requirements.txt 2>/dev/null || uv export --no-hashes --no-header --no-dev --no-emit-project > requirements.txt && uv run python scripts/agent_engine_app.py --env=prod
